mapper.insert: insert into chapters (c_id, n_id, c_name, c_words, create_time, update_time, c_test01, c_test02, c_test03, c_content) values (#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cWords,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cTest01,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTest02,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTest03,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
